content:
Perfect! I've created a beautiful restaurant listing UI with all 10 restaurants. Here's what I built:

## UI Features:

**Header Section:**
- Title: "Restaurant Directory"
- Subtitle with a welcoming message

**Restaurant Cards:** Each restaurant displays:
- ğŸ½ï¸ **Restaurant Name** (prominent heading)
- **Address** with street details
- ğŸ“ **Location** (City, Country)
- ğŸ½ï¸ **Cuisine Types** - all food categories listed
- ğŸ’° **Price Level** - visual representation with dollar signs (3-9 out of 10)

**Design Elements:**
- Clean card-based layout
- Professional styling with primary red color (#D32F2F)
- Light gray background for better readability
- Vertical scrolling list for easy browsing
- Consistent spacing and typography hierarchy

All 10 restaurants are now displayed:
1. La Bella Italia (New York)
2. Sushi Paradise (San Francisco)
3. Burger Junction (Chicago)
4. Le Jardin (Paris)
5. Spice Garden (London)
6. Taco Fiesta (Los Angeles)
7. The Golden Dragon (San Francisco)
8. Mediterranean Breeze (Barcelona)
9. The Steakhouse (New York)
10. CafÃ© Delights (Boston)

The UI is fully rendered and ready to use!
